example.name: Arg1 as a subject
example.text: Burger King 's chief executive officer , Barry Gibbons , stars in ads saying that the fast-food chain will donate 25 cents to the Red Cross for every purchase of a BK Doubles hamburger .
example.arg: Burger King 's chief executive officer , Barry Gibbons ,
in ads saying that the fast-food chain will donate 25 cents to the Red Cross for every purchase of a BK Doubles hamburger

example.name: Arg2 as a subject
example.text: NBC News has produced three episodes of an occasional series produced [*] by Sid Feders called [*] `` Yesterday , Today and Tomorrow , '' starring Maria Shriver , Chuck Scarborough and Mary Alice Williams , that [*T*-1] also gives work to actors .
example.arg: Maria Shriver , Chuck Scarborough and Mary Alice Williams
